typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	fileNameDataFlow as string,
	coloumnNamesDataFlow as any
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	wildcardPaths:[($fileNameDataFlow)]) ~> ParamDataFlow
ParamDataFlow select(mapColumn(
		each(match(in($coloumnNamesDataFlow,name)))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
SelectColumns sink(input(
		cust_id as string,
		first_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		address as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['customer_selected.csv'],
	truncate: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ParamDataFlowSink
